function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 stability at different temperatures and humidity levels","Impact":"High viability of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments at certain temperature and humidity ranges","Mitigation":"Careful monitoring and control of indoor temperature and humidity to reduce virus viability","Technologies":"HVAC systems with temperature and humidity control, air cleaning devices","People":"Building occupants, particularly in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians, building owners"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of filters and air cleaning methods","Impact":"Low efficiency of certain filters and air cleaning methods in removing SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Regular replacement and maintenance of filters, use of effective air cleaning devices like HEPA filters and UV cleaning equipment","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV cleaning equipment, HVAC systems with air-cleaning capability","People":"Building occupants, particularly in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians, building owners"},{"Description":"Risk of high relative humidity and low humidity levels","Impact":"Sensitivity to infections at very low relative humidity and lack of reduction in virus viability in moderate humidity","Mitigation":"Maintain indoor humidity within moderate range, avoid very low and very high humidity conditions","Technologies":"Humidity control systems, dehumidifiers, humidifiers","People":"Building occupants, particularly in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians, building owners"}]}
